item.title: About
item.description: Kate Hertweck is the bioinformatics training manager at Fred Hutchinson Cancer Research Center, where they lead development and implementation of courses on reproducible computational methods through fredhutch.

item.title: Why did this take so long?
item.description: For someone who has bought into social media and reproducible research in so many other ways, itâ€™s difficult to pinpoint exactly why it took me this long to invest more fully in a website for myself.

item.title: X
item.description: This website is built using the Minimal Mistakes Jekyll theme and is deployed using a public GitHub repository and GitHub Pages.
